scripts.outdated: (npm outdated || true) && lerna exec --ignore @template/* --stream --no-bail -- npm outdated
scripts.publish: lerna exec --ignore @template/* --stream --no-bail -- npm publish --access public --tag next
scripts.remove: (lerna exec --ignore @template/* --stream -- rm -rf node_modules || true) && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.reinstall: npm run remove && npm run update
scripts.update: npm install && lerna exec --ignore @template/* --stream -- npm install && npm update && lerna exec --ignore @template/* --stream -- npm update && npm run outdated
